attributes.action: Make Malicious/False Allegations a Criminal Offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to consider introducing a Bill of Law which would make False Allegations by 
maliciously motivated individuals a Criminal Offence.
(ie; False allegations of Racism, Fasle allegations of Rape, etc,etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
